Topic.Title: Sister Location: The Text Adventure [Beta Testers Needed!!]

Posts.EditableText:
Hey, so I made a game called Five Nights At Freddy's the Text Adventure last year, this year, I'm porting Sister Location. It will turn out to be just as good as its predecessor, Sounds, Amazing Descriptions, and more! 
But....
I'm implementing some new code that I haven't used before, so I need people to test the game and leave me any bug reports here, or on the game page. Those who help me squash some bugs will be credited when the full game releases!
Here's A Link: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/zafjoeffkessjg9ot9drsw/sister-location-the-text-adventure-beta
[To Do"]
Nights 2-5
Secret Stuff
Game Pic
Publish Full Version
[ChangeLog]
Added Extras Menu (2-28-17)
New Link ^ (3-6-17)

Posts.EditableText: Update: I'm taking a bit of a break for a few days, I've been stressing out over code, and it isn't helping me out too well. I hope to get an update released this week or early next week!
